title: Firebox latest update (7/31) screwed up side by side adjustment. Debug instructionxs are gibberish.
content: Stop trying to fix, then sabotaging, whatever we finally cobbled together to get things to work. Yesterday, I could set a Firefox page alongside another application, each half a screen, side by side. Today, your idiot upgrade only allows the firefox page to shrink to 2/3 of screen measured horizontally, so it blocks the other half-screen application. You coders and your mania of fixing what ain't broke and breaking what weren't!
creator: markmulligan

title: Picture-in-Picture Settings
content:
For the past few days, my picture-in-picture that shows up for videos always just goes to fullscreen. I am unable to resize the video or have anything else up, it just becomes a full screen of whatever I chose which defeats the purpose, I feel, of this setting.

Please help.
creator: amazingirl400

title: Firefox frequent crashes
content:
I recently changed my RAM clock speed to 3600mhz and the crashing started. When it was set to 2400mhz it was working fine.

RAM: T-Force VulcanZ 3600mhz

ID: bp-0cf8fec5-9370-489a-9d7c-314ac0220801
creator: minit.patel1997

title: Can't get compact mode back
content: I want compact mode back! I had a theme that enabled it, now it's not working. Not only that, enabling compact mode in config didn't make it compact, nor did it give me the option to change densities in the toolbar under "more tools." What's even more aggravating is that Firefox has made all the elements too big so I feel like it's set for a low-vision user. I can't change the graphical aspects, changing the fonts did not help. Zooming out makes it too small. You ruined a perfectly useful browser. Are you sick of your job, or are you just stupid?
creator: tlshell

title: Firefox Browser
content: My web pages have increased in size on their own. I tried shrinking the font size a bit but it is not the font but the pages (borders, etc)....how do I get it back to normal and why did it do this?
creator: garywojton2

title: Automatic logins failing
content: Why is Firefox going back to sign-in mode for all my web accounts?
creator: john.visser

title: "Old Firefox Data" created by update
content: My wife's Firefox browser just updated, July, 2022. Her profile seems to have been lost, but there is an "old Firefox data" folder on her desktop. Can you point us to current instructions for using the old-data folder to restore her profile?
creator: ries.lindley
